title: Zion Williamson, Tom Brady, Lakers-Clippers, & Kevin Durant
itunes:title: Zion Williamson, Tom Brady, Lakers-Clippers, & Kevin Durant
description:
Colin comments on another excellent performance by Zion Williamson, why he feels Tom Brady is being too sensitive about his situation in New England, why the Clippers would love to face the Lakers in the Western Conference Finals, and his thoughts on the recent Kevin Durant comments. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Rashad Jennings, Sam Amick, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
